headline.main: MUNDA DEFENSES HEAVILY BOMBED; Vila Air Base on Kolombangara Also Hit as U.S. Fliers Continue Solomons Drive 21 JAPANESE BARGES SUNK Our Bombers Catch 14 Along New Guinea Coast -- Allies Strike Netherland Indies

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN THE SOUTHWEST PACIFIC, Sunday, Aug. 1 (AP) -- United States Army and Navy warplanes delivered a series of smashing attacks against Japanese positions in the Central Solomons yesterday, concentrating their bombs around the Munda and Vila airdromes.
abstract: Allied planes fire Jap barges, Huon Peninsula; destroy 7 barges, blow up supply dump, New Brit; raid Sumba and Wetar Islands
